description: You are given the customer visit log of a shop represented by a 0-indexed string customers consisting only of characters 'N' and 'Y': If the shop closes at the jth hour (0 <= j <= n), the penalty is calculated as follows: Return the earliest hour at which the shop must be closed to incur a minimum penalty. Note that if a shop closes at the jth hour, it means the shop is closed at the hour j.
